issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Building shows the gen folder missing. There will be another ticket about the .gitignore folder forcibly being overwritten.

$ git diff demos/KitchenSink/build/android/.gitignore
diff --git a/demos/KitchenSink/build/android/.gitignore b/demos/KitchenSink/build/android/.gitignore
index b986ac0..8a790b2 100644
--- a/demos/KitchenSink/build/android/.gitignore
+++ b/demos/KitchenSink/build/android/.gitignore
@@ -2,5 +2,4 @@ src
 lib
 bin
 res
-gen
 AndroidManifest.xml
{html}
